author: lwhynda
title: Mirrors - Review
text: The shower and toilet are behind mirrors which at first is a bit weird being able to see yourself as mirrors are inside as well but you soon get used to it. The room was spotlessly clean. The coffee machine and kettle and cups and mugs were so clean they looked brand new. The bed was very comfortable, we both had a good nights sleep. We were very lucky having such good views. As we didn't eat here I can't comment on the food. We had a very warm friendly welcome and given a map of London and shown on the map directions where we wanted to go. A top notch hotel.
